code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function UpdateShipment(_ref){let{contract,accounts}=_ref;const[orderId,setOrderId]=useState(0);const[location,setLocation]=useState("");const[status,setStatus]=useState(0);const handleSubmit=async event=>{event.preventDefault();await contract.methods.updateShipment(orderId,location,status).send({from:accounts[0]});alert("Shipment updated successfully!");setOrderId(0);setLocation("");setStatus(0);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Update Shipment"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Order ID:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:orderId,onChange:e=>setOrderId(parseInt(e.target.value)),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Location:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:location,onChange:e=>setLocation(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Status:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:status,onChange:e=>setStatus(parseInt(e.target.value)),required:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:0,children:"In Warehouse"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:1,children:"In Transit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:2,children:"Delivered"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Update Shipment"})]})]});}export default UpdateShipment;
